DOC.brief_summary: This eight-month research project use one group pretest-midst-posttest design . This study base self-efficacy self-regulation Social Cognitive Theory . The investigator recruit 50 university student body mass index 24 kg/m2 one university campus . Participation completely voluntary . After pretesting , 12-week `` Mi Band Step Challenge '' launch immediately . Participants assess validated instrument International Physical Activity Questionnaire ( IPAQ ) -Taiwan short-form , Sedentary Behavior Questionnaire ( SBQ ) , self-efficacy self-regulation questionnaire . Mi Band activity tracker use monitor step count . An ioi 353 body composition analyzer use ass body composition . Data analyze use generalize estimate equation ( GEE ) . The expected outcome study include : ( 1 ) `` Mi Band Step Challenge '' develop base theory , expect effective . If true , intervention package apply different type college university overweight student . ( 2 ) `` Mi Band Step Challenge '' potential use reference healthy weight - physical activity , embed School Health Promotion Program execute Ministry Education . ( 3 ) The result study serve example promotion evidence-based health care .
DOC.brief_title: Mi Band Step Challenge Improve Body Composition Overweight University Students
DOC.criteria: University student body mass index 24 kg/m2 one university campus . No physical limitation would prevent perform physical activity . Not currently pregnant woman . Having smart phone would allow connect Mi Band . The university student expect absent 2 week expect suspension transfer another school implementation intervention .
